name: Clearance Sale
effect: All cards and packs in shop are 25% off

name: Liquidation
effect: All cards and packs in shop are 50% off

name: Hone
effect: Foil, Holographic, and Polychrome cards appear 2X more often

name: Glow Up
effect: Foil, Holographic, and Polychrome cards appear 4X more often

name: Telescope
effect: Celestial Packs always contain the Planet card for your most played poker hand

name: Observatory
effect: Planet cards in your Consumable area give X1.5 Mult for their specific poker hand

name: Tarot Merchant
effect: Tarots appear 2X more frequently in the shop

name: Tarot Tycoon
effect: Tarots appear 4X more frequently in the shop

name: Planet Merchant
effect: Planets appear 2X more frequently in the shop

name: Planet Tycoon
effect: Planets appear 4X more frequently in the shop

name: Seed Money
effect: Raise the cap on interest earned per round to $10

name: Money Tree
effect: Raise the cap on interest earned per round to $20

name: Magic Trick
effect: Playing cards can be purchased from the shop

name: Illusion
effect: Playing cards in shop may have an Enhancement, Edition, and/or Seal

name: Director's Cut
effect: Reroll Boss Blind 1 time per Ante
